00025 #ifndef _BASE_TRAJECTORYTIMEREP_
00026 #define _BASE_TRAJECTORYTIMEREP_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 
00030 #include <base/ReferencedObject>
00031 #include <base/Serializable>
00032 #include <base/Cloneable>
00033 
00034 #include <base/Time>
00035 
00036 
00037 namespace base {
00038 
00039 
00040 /**
00041  *  Abstract interface for concrete trajectory time representations used by class Trajectory.
00042  *  (users should use class Trajectory directly; implementors of new representations
00043  *   should implement this interface and add appropriate support in Trajectory)
00044  */
00045 class TrajectoryTimeRep : public ReferencedObject, virtual public Serializable, virtual public Cloneable
00046 {
00047 public:
00048 
00049   /// get time at s:[0..1]
00050   virtual Time time(Real s) const = 0;
00051 
00052   /// shift time by dt
00053   virtual void shiftTime(const Time& dt) = 0;
00054 
00055   /// scale time by s
00056   virtual void scaleTime(Real s) = 0;
00057 
00058   /// get parameter s value at time t
00059   virtual Real gets(const Time& t) const = 0;
00060   
00061 };
00062 
00063 
00064 } // base
00065 
00066 #endif
